column5: Another great issue TJ, thanks.  More good stuff in there, not to mention this month's Off the Dock toon. Those who don't already subscribe, take a minute to do so...you won't be disappointed. Click the link below.  http://ontariofishing.net/subscribe.html
I get mine every month in my email.I have learned so much in there Keep up the great work TJ  Paul
Thanks for the shout out Roy!  It's one of my fav toons.  Great read TJ!
